website_summaries.verdict: A great choice if you find that most pre-workout powders leave you jittery.
pros: Gives you fast energy without relying too heavily on caffeine
Provides sustained energy for long, difficult workouts
cons: Contains artificial colors and sweeteners in some flavors

customer_reviews.title: Dental Erosion!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE of Dental Erosion! I've been drinking amino energy for 1.5 years as a replacement for coffee thinking it seemed like a healthier option. I am 30 years old and would drink 1 shaker cup 20oz with 3 scoops of amino energy once a day. I liked the taste of amino energy flavors and felt it gave me a good amount of energy for the day. I recently went to the dentist whom I havent seen in the past 1.5 years and found out I had severe acid erosion to my teeth due to drinking amino energy. I just want to make others aware of the dental erosion they could get from drinking this.
customer_reviews.author: Tory S.

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?!! Chemical taste.
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start by saying we usually like this product. This is our 3rd tub and there is something terribly wrong with it. We’ve been using this product for over a year. The powder looked the same but tastes... can’t describe it in any other way than it taste like chemicals. It doesn’t even smell the same. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime916

customer_reviews.title: They cheat you on the product!
customer_reviews.text: Pictures attached. This is the second time I've purchased the product. As for the energy level, it's okay. However, my complaint is that they cheat you on the amount of the product. Pictures are of a brand new can. As you can see, the can is less than half way full. The first time this happened, I thought it was a fluke. Apparently not. Message to the company: either shorten the can or add more product to the current can size.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Fake product??? Possible scam
customer_reviews.text: This product did not come with an inner seal. The taste is very bitter and artificial. I'm wondering if they used the container and filled it with something cheaper and then resealed the outside. Seems like several other reviews say the same across the different flavors. It's sad because ON has such great, dependable products.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Cho

customer_reviews.title: My stomach says no 😔
customer_reviews.text: I normally do fine with this brand, but this flavor really messed with my stomach. I tried a few different times weeks apart, but every time I drank this flavor I didn’t feel well. I gave it to a friend and it didn’t bother her at all so it was probably just me. I enjoyed the flavor, but not the after affect of an upset stomach along with a good cleanse of my system.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Alot of ENERGY no crash
customer_reviews.text: This is an honest and true review of this item, which I purchased full price on Amazon.com: I have been using Amino energy for over a year now and I'm not looking to change. It has been a complete lifesaver for working graveyards. I have plenty of energy throughout the night with no crash and when I get home, I can fall asleep easily. The grape flavor is one of my favorites, it reminds me of a grape otter pop. There is nothing I would change about this product, I recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick K.

customer_reviews.title: Optimum Amino Energy
customer_reviews.text: This stuff out of the other flavors is my favorite. It doesn't make you feel like crap and it does give me a little edge to my workouts. Also - and to note the most effective part of this is the drastic reduction in muscle soreness. After working out it seems that this stuff does help with relieving some of that. This in turn makes it easier to go back and keep working on it! I have the peach and blue flavor one and when those are gone I am going to get a couple more bottles of the grape!
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste, but not value
customer_reviews.text: For what ever reason, the company uses a much bigger container than needed for 30 servings, by almost double. IN other words, the container appears to be half empty when you get it. But it is just 30 servings. Grape flavor tastes fantastic though. There are A LOT of other ingredients in this that are most likely designed to mask the horrible smell and taste of true naked amino's. So they did manage to make it smell and taste great. But if your not fond of all those other chemicals and ingredients, like Soy Lecithin, then pass this one by. If you cannot stomach real, natural amino's, then this is a great product. Just a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS STUFF!! TASTES AMAZING & IT GIVES YOU ENERGY FROM THE GREEN TEA LEAF!!
customer_reviews.text: I drink so much more water with this mixed in to it for sure. I would say I'm definitely addicted to Amino Grape drink mix! I've tried the other flavors but this one by far is my favorite. I bring it everywhere and don't even drink pop any more because of this stuff right here. Low on calories too and great to hydrate you before and after workouts with just enough energy to were I'm not jittery cause i hate being jittery. If you like Grape flavoring this is the stuff to buy for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste and No Jitters
customer_reviews.text: I was on the hunt for a good pre-workout and I have tried SO MANY. I found that all Amino Energy products have had a great taste and work really well. There are no jitters and you do not feel your heart pounding after consuming. If you are sensitive to caffeine I suggest starting off with the lowest (or half the lowest amount) and working up to what you can handle. I also suggest that you consume this before 12pm (is sensitive to caffeine) as this can keep you awake late into the night if you drink it for a night or afternoon workout.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Joy

customer_reviews.title: Something wrong with these, taste is totally off and horrid.
customer_reviews.text: This got the lowest possible score because this happened yet again with my order from amazon. I have been drinking this Cotton Candy flavor since it was put out by ON, but this is the second time I order from amazon and got a taste that is not cotton candy and taste gross. The exp date was fine, there was a batch number but it taste horrid. I will not buy it from Amazon any longer, there is something wrong with the batches they have. Now let me also add, it was a long time in between purchases and I decided to give it another shot thinking the bad batch would be gone but nope. Same bad taste.
customer_reviews.author: VL Powers

customer_reviews.title: Cotton candy lovers will like this.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been on a cotton candy kick lately after getting some cotton candy coffee so I decided I needed something for workout time , did a search and this popped up, sounded reasonably priced for 30 servings. It’s okay as for taste but if you want it to really taste good then you have to add more than one scoop. It dissolved in my shaker cup with water just fine and I’d really love it if I didn’t have to use so much to get the flavor I want.
customer_reviews.author: Reading reading reading

customer_reviews.title: So Good, I Could Freebase it.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a few weeks and I am totally a raving fan. I quit drinking coffee a couple years ago because I was getting stomach aches and head aches. I had a decent amount of energy mainly from good sleep and being a particular eater. I decided to work this in as an alternative to other flavored soft drinks etc.. I am very impressed. It didn't necessarily make me crazy with energy but I can definitely feel a huge difference in my focus and attitude throughout the day. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jake The Snake

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and affective
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so delicious. I love the fact there is only 5 calories, and that my energy levels are up throughout the day. I drink this 1st thing in the morning before yoga. My muscles get very sore, and this stuff really does help with fast recovery. I do highly recommend this product 100%
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: As a pre-workout, I feel like its working. Most argue to say that its a total placebo but you'll have to be the judge of that for yourself to see what exactly works. Personally, I feel like its an effective product. Whenever I consume 2 scoops, I feel the extra energy to push my workout past my energy levels. I get off work around 4:30 pm and I work out around 9 pm, this product total helps me do at least 1.5 hours in the gym. So don't take my review on this because I believe​ it works for me, try it for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Dex

customer_reviews.title: Grows On You
customer_reviews.text: Oddly Tasty Smell- Interesting Texture- Smooth Taste- Super Green Tea/ Somewhat bitter Quantity- Good Amount Cost/ Benefit- Worth A Shot- For Green Tea Fans *Tip* Mix serving size with hot water- Chill in freezer or fridge- Pour over Ice For Yummy BCAA ICED GREEN TEA :)
customer_reviews.author: Cat Z

customer_reviews.title: Will not order through amazon again.
customer_reviews.text: This was not amino. I have ordered grape for years. It’s my favorite. I thought the person that said the grape tasted toxic was crazy. I ordered this through amazon. When I opened it I noticed it didn’t smell like the grape amino. It also did not taste like the grape amino I know and love. It was exactly like the review I saw described. It tasted toxic. I will not order this through amazon again
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe

customer_reviews.title: Made me very sick
customer_reviews.text: This product made me extremely sick almost immediately after drinking it. It’s like my body hit the emergency evacuation button. Not something you want to feel right in the morning. I took it as a am kickstart as claimed on the packaging. Although upon opening it has a very strong and desirable cotton candy smell (like fresh from a carnival) The product does not taste like cotton candy at all. I was expecting cotton candy flavor like you taste in the bang energy. Instead it tasted watered down sour taste. Returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Been buying Amino Energy for a few years now and I love this stuff. I'm hypersensitive to legitimate preworkouts but this stuff gives you enough boost without the major side effects (alert longer than desired, itchiness). Also, my biggest negative about preworkouts is that most people don't know how to function without it. This stuff is easy to ween yourself off of or even go cold turkey. Additionally, it has a bunch of other great stuff for recovery and the ingredients list isn't horrifying like others I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Shane S

customer_reviews.title: It DOES give you energy
customer_reviews.text: I decided to write this review just in case someone else was wondering... just received this product today and I drank one full pack with a 1.5l of water.. taste was great and it mixed totally fine. The only issue was that I drank later in the afternoon to workout.. it is 4am and I’m still up. (I’m not sure if one pack was too much for my body size - I’m 120lbs).. I’m gonna try taking only half the amount next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie F

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, just wish there was more.
customer_reviews.text: The container arrived less than half full of powder, so I was fairly disappointed. It tastes pretty good, it’s actually a much more subtle flavor than I was expecting but it tastes slightly like fun dip so I think it’s delicious. As far as effects go, I think it’s a pretty solid preworkout I can definitely feel it kick in and give me an energy boost. An unexpected downside is it is super messy I always get powder everywhere every time I mix it, and I think it’s because it’s such a fine consistency, I’ve never had that problem with any other preworkout but this one ends up all over my clothes and floor and everything.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Best workout drink for me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been in the gym over 20 yrs and have have bought every type of supplement possible. Almost all are GARBAGE and FAKE!!! Real food makes the body grow and lose fat. I don’t drink coffee and Amino Energy out of all pre works gives me that little bit to get me going... I use 3 scoops. I like that it doesn’t get me all itchy or jittery. If you are looking for a supplement, get this one. It’s the only one in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Silas Keeler

customer_reviews.title: Questionable
customer_reviews.text: When I revived the product it was leaking. I bought some from GNC before this came in, the seal was different on the two, the scooper was different on the two, and the writing color on the bottom was different. The product from GNC works 10x better than the product off of amazon. I read this in multiple reviews also.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett Cagle

customer_reviews.title: Price creeps up worse than gas
customer_reviews.text: This used to be a good value.. but now at a 1.79 an ounce. No way. every time i go to purchase again, it seems to go up a bit more. i’m not buying any more and.. ive bought a lot of this in the past. Your greed is forcing me to look for another option that’s more fairly priced. i used to like ON for the quality+ value. Now you seem to want to be as bad as the other companies in this market. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Snarils

customer_reviews.title: Amazing taste, AWESOME SKOOTH ENERGY!!
customer_reviews.text: I got the grape flavor and this thing tastes so good I kind of just want to sit in the gym and sip on it. It gives me the perfect amount of smooth energy. I am on ADHD medication and usually taking anything with caffeine actually makes me sleepy. Miraculously this one didn’t and instead gave me Some of the best workouts of my life! Definitely recommend. I can’t wait to try other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: White Peach Tea, a taste bud explosion, refreshing  and light.
customer_reviews.text: White Peach Tea was a taste bud explosion, refreshing and light. Highly recommend the White Peach Tea and will purchase again. Mint flavour had a strange after taste, will not purchase again. The half and half flavour also had a strange after taste, will not purchase. again. However, I do recommend the following flavour. White Peach Tea, Blueberry Mojito, and Strawberry Lime.
customer_reviews.author: Hopsong

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Energy to Get You Going!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby and I are addicted to diet soda... instead of coffee each morning, we survive by drinking diet soda....... well that is until we found this Amino Powder!!! It gives us energy, tastes pretty decent and the best thing is it takes away the desire for soda for us....... after drinking it, we really only crave water for a couple hours! Not really why we bought the product but it ended up being a HUGE perk!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.text: This is my ninth time buying this item and I can tell you that this time it doesn’t taste the same! No flavor on it! I don’t feel the energy like before and me and my family tried it and we all are agreed that the quality of the product it’s already dropped! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Mella

customer_reviews.title: Great mid afternoon drink
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how many tubs of this I've gone though, but it's a lot! This is my go to for a mid afternoon drink instead of coffee. I couldn't be happier with the taste, blend-ability, and value. I mean other companies are charging twice as much for the same quantity of the same ingredients. Highly recommend. This is an honest review from someone who purchased the product.
customer_reviews.author: TechMan

customer_reviews.title: All Around Average Product
customer_reviews.text: Was not a big fan of the taste or results. I've bought a number of similar products but this one was just average. I never felt any different, didn't notice any extra energy before, during or after my workouts. The taste was very overwhelming, more towards a sweet candy grape drink. I've used 90% of the bottle, wanting to give it a chance but will not be buying this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris10093

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and energy packed
customer_reviews.text: This cotton candy flavor is my all time favorite. I get enough energy to get me through my workout without any jitters or itchy feeling. I’ve bought directly from gnc and optimum nutrition and I feel like the one I got from amazon was the same as the other retailers. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kelsay

customer_reviews.title: Nice Standard Preworkout
customer_reviews.text: This ON Essential Amino Energy seems like it will be a good preworkout for regular use. It doesn't pack the punch that some do, but those are better saved for when you really need that extra boost. I'm not crazy about the cotton candy flavor so I'll be trying the concord grape next time. It's not bad though, and it mixes well. It would be great if they had a grapefruit or lemon drop flavor. The container size is definitely excessive for the amount it contains and could be misleading if you were browsing in person. The official response is probably that the powder settles or something, but similar products manage to use appropriately sized containers with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Household fav!
customer_reviews.text: The amino energy from optimum nutrition is a household favorite. We typically have this in stock on a regular basis, and I favor the cotton candy (and grape), especially when it’s really cold. I add my vegetable powder blend to make sure I drink that daily as well. amazon always has the best price and coupons on this brand too.
customer_reviews.author: Tulsa_Nash

customer_reviews.title: Horrible After Taste
customer_reviews.text: This tastes like crap..starts out good like grape, ends like ammonia. Who thinks this tastes yummy as the marketer? Can anyone just make products with REAL sugar? Only??? No freaking "natural" stevia crap either. Not everyone believes this trash will make them Arnie..the whole market has gone terribly off track with BS sugar substitutes. Chocolates are like chalk.
customer_reviews.author: ausipt

customer_reviews.title: Good Taste.  Good energy.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different pre-workouts. I got the grape flavor of this, and it is the best tasting pre-workout I have tried. I would get a decent little energy boost after drinking. I never got the tingles I normally get from the beta-alanine though, even after mixing a bottle of water really strong with 5 or 6 scoops, so that makes me question the contents a bit. I would purchase again though.
customer_reviews.author: Sm1078

customer_reviews.title: Slightly sour/bitter, but yummy and works!
customer_reviews.text: I love amino energy! This is the second flavor I’ve tried. The cotton candy is a little sour but if you put peanut butter powder or a banana in your shake it really helps with the bitterness. It definitely gives me the energy I need. The price point is great.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: It works and tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: The amount it suggests is a little strong, I’ll do one scoop next time. The results however far out weigh the potency. I typically shake for two days after working out no matter what I have tried. 10 minutes after drinking half a glass (16oz). I stopped shaking. My muscles the next day did not hurt today. This is great stuff!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Berger

customer_reviews.title: Works well - recommendation on packaging
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Clear instructions on label. All flavors, I've tried 3, are as described. One dislike, packaging size. It's like a bag of chips. 1/3 full of powder and I only mention because it makes scooping out the powder harder than it should be. Please change the packaging container or give a scoop with a longer handle.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great Amino Energy
customer_reviews.text: Came sealed and fresh, no clumps. Love that it doesn’t make my face numb, and offers a “cleaner” energy boost. I don’t get the sudden jolt, followed by severe loss of energy.. No stomach issues either. I use it for my workouts, and when I need a boost at work. Grape tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it does!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product now for about a year. I usually take it as directed once to twice a day, usually before workouts. It Works!!! I usually go for the grape flavor and it tastes awesome. I would recommend to anyone that works out on a regular basis or anyone who is active that needs a "pick me up".
customer_reviews.author: Terryjr

customer_reviews.title: 1 scoop not 2
customer_reviews.text: 20 oz bottle of water 5 scoops; thinking drink will be short on sweetness. Drink is too sweet. 2oz maybe 3oz that I did gave me a caffeine pow! Shazaam ! WOW! Preparing for later use I split the rest into 2 bottles. But after this pow WOW, I’ll dilute the 2 bottles for less of a Shazaam. Start with one scoop not 2
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite flavor
customer_reviews.text: I've tried 4 different flavors of the Amino Energy brand and this one was lower on the list. It definitely tastes like grape, but it is very sweet and very artificial. I like the ON brand and their ingredients/formulas. Just not this flavor. Tastes like a grape lollipop.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren L.

customer_reviews.title: WHITE SEAL MISSING
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but am giving it a one star to warn people this vendor does not include what seal over package. There was just a black seal around the lid. I get this product very often from Costco and had a similar one at home and this was not how it came.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Nobani

customer_reviews.title: A great supplement for training and non training days!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite supplement on the market. I bought this product for its many uses... pre workout, during workout, post workout, a little kick start or healing on off days. I've enjoyed every flavor I've gotten so far. The grape flavor is rolling. If it's too sweet for you, add a little extra water. I usually only use a scoop or two at a time. I do not use other preworkout anymore, just this and a kre supplement. It doesnt give me the jitters but it does fuel me. I can't brag enough about this product
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Grape tastes awful
customer_reviews.text: First off, I love this product. I love it so much that I choke down the grape flavor. It is a great BCAA, a great pre-workout, and makes me sweat like no other (some people like that kind of thing.) BUT the grape flavor it so so so bad! The best way to describe it, is that it tastes like hair dye smells. Buy this product for sure, but avoid the grape flavor at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: K. Minter

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I previously used C4, and decided to give this a chance. Mixed feeling about the the preworkout effects, but love the flavor! I prefer to minimize my caffeine intake, so I only use half a serving, but definitely felt more workout-ready with C4 than this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bananas

customer_reviews.text: Cotton candy flavor is good but very sweet. Cant complain.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good stuff for the price
customer_reviews.text: The taste was decent. If you like mint tea, and you like green tea...it tastes like mint tea with green tea. If you don’t, you won’t like it. I was surprised by the amount of energy it gave me. I work very long days and towards the early evening I started drinking a little at a time of this and pretty much buzzed through the evening. Yes, I will buy it again because it’s pretty good stuff, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best thing that ever happened to my fit and healthy lifestyle!! It really takes your workout routine to another level. When I first read the reviews I thought people were exaggerating, but boy, was I wrong! I now buy it every month because I don’t think I ever want to workout without having taken my BCAA! It also tastes great! My favorite flavor so far is grapes, but watermelon is good too!
customer_reviews.author: Brett Owens

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well for me. good taste but see no difference
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 2-3 months but don't see any difference using this product. I liked the taste of amino energy flavors. But the size of the container is big so it seems like there would be good quantity but the container is half empty.
customer_reviews.author: Sumit

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product Caffeine is from green tea and green coffee it doesn't mess with my stomach and is much smoother than regular caffeine I like the ability to adjust dosage per scoop Blue raz grape orange are best flavor Cafe series mixed with milk as good as coffee house style drinks I use this in the morning as a wake me up and afternoon as a pick me up No jitters no crash Amino acids are added benefit Great product
customer_reviews.author: Addicted 2 tha Pump

customer_reviews.title: I get amino energy every month
customer_reviews.text: Honestly one of, if not the best in this category. I get grape flavor on a consistent basis because it’s easily the best flavor.. some of the others are terrible. But grape and fruit punch are decent and I use it as a morning caffeine rush to get me through boring virtual meetings and as a pre-workout that doesn’t make me feel like my face is going to melt off. Would buy again. Have recommended to many.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Fezell

customer_reviews.title: Good product so far..
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been using this product for several years now as a preworkout or just anytime we need an extra boost of energy. This was our first time ordering from Amazon though. The cans arrived with an outer seal but did not have the seal on the top of the can after removing the lid. The product tasted the same as always (we ordered grape) but after reading several reviews I am concerned that we might end up with a knockoff eventually if we continue to order from Amazon. For now we are satisfied with our order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cotton Candy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't taste like cotton candy. If you're looking for the cotton candy flavor like BANG or other Reign this isn't it. This doesn't taste like cotton candy. It smells like cotton candy but doesn't taste one bit like cotton candy.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Good Mix
customer_reviews.text: Mixes well with Water - need at least a 20 oz water for it, though, and drink a couple sips first to leave enough room for the powder, which keeps coming out after you think it's all gone. But I really like it - great in the summer and during/after workouts.
customer_reviews.author: kcogata

customer_reviews.title: I feel good tannanananana
customer_reviews.text: I love this big container, grape flavor and it helps me fast a little longer. Whenever I drink this I don’t feel hungry for awhile since I get a surge of energy and helps me through my workouts. I didn’t have any of the issues described in negative reviews. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: @Countmyavocados

customer_reviews.title: Tampered or filled with fake product
customer_reviews.text: The product had no inner seal like the one we purchased locally, tasted like grape kool aid, the outer seal wasn’t tight . I am not comfortable consuming this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lalie Rogers

customer_reviews.title: It could be a bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I've seen a few reviews and it's true. I also had a terrible batch of Concord Grape that tasted like chalk. It was awful and barely drinkable. But there is a remedy. I contacted the Customer Service on Optimum Nutrition and after filling out information regarding batch and exp date, they sent me a free replacement. Definitely do you diligence and follow through instead of dealing with it.
customer_reviews.author: PSPS

customer_reviews.title: Good energy.
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this for a long time now. I don’t love that it contains Sucralose as I’d rather have a little sugar in place of artificial sweetener. The caffeine plus aminos is a nice combo. Pretty quick energy that lasts through a great workout. Great morning caffeine.
customer_reviews.author: AT McD

customer_reviews.title: I definitely feel less sore when using this
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how much I notice the "energy" part, although I only take two scoops, the lowest serving. I always work out in the morning (5:30 a.m.) so always pretty tired, but when I drink this, it probably gives me a little boost. I am doing crossfit workouts, so always breathing heavy anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting (in a bad way)
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get Cotton Candy BCAA because it's one of my fav flavors. Unfortunately it's very salty and tastes like a watered down salty snow cone. The product has some sediment that falls back to the bottom of the shaker as you're drinking it. So I guess it's not mixing properly. I tried to use it for a full week but I personally could not get past the salty taste or the grittiness as you get to the bottom. I will not be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: B. W.

customer_reviews.title: I would like to try other flavors
customer_reviews.text: I don't hate this Preworkout, I love how it makes me feel, it kicks in quickly, and it doesn't make me shakey or jittery feeling BUT I would definitely like to try different flavor(s.) I ordered the cotton candy one. At first it taste like blue raspberry but personally I think it has a slight aftertaste of Pepto Bismol. It's not bad enough to where I wouldn't drink it at all but I would like to find a flavor that's easier to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla R.

customer_reviews.title: Use it daily and love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this stuff... I drink it throughout the day and when I workout... it has replaced energy drinks and I notice I don’t get as sore when I use it. The taste of the grape it great!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather N Saito

customer_reviews.title: Great energy drink!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pick me up, and the energy boost from it is no joke- I can’t drink it unless I plan to do something physical shortly, like swim or go to the gym- otherwise I become too jittery. I only use a two scoop serving and that is plenty. It tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kapcoe

customer_reviews.title: COTTON CANDY!
customer_reviews.text: I have sample tons of pre-workouts from high dollar to dirt cheap, and I always come back to this brand. Its not terribly strong, but it isn't weak either. Some preworkouts actually change my mood with all their crazy ingredients, and this one doesn't at all. I love that there are so many different flavors to choose from. The watermelon and pineapple with electrolytes are great for extra hydration....but this COTTON CANDY one is just delicious. I've had wayyyy more than I should this week because it was just too delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Texy

customer_reviews.title: I liked it
customer_reviews.text: I was that dumb person who ordered this without reading the reviews... after I placed the order I went to read them and felt instant regret... but it was too late lol well I just got it and omg I was so scared to try it but wow I loved the taste it’s exactly what I expected it to be y’all the smell is not good tho it does have a powdery smell but I love the taste so it’s whatevs to me so yah
customer_reviews.author: Damaris rivas

customer_reviews.title: Energy without the jitters
customer_reviews.text: I have thyroid cancer and had a Thyroidectomy 6 months ago. Since surgery I have been struggling with energy levels. I started taking amino energy mixed with 32oz or water 2x a day and finally feel like myself again. It really helps with energy and focus. The cotton candy flavor is good, but juicy strawberry burst is definitely the best.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hoopes

customer_reviews.title: Good, but will go back to blue raspberry next
customer_reviews.text: Really love this product, but don't totally love this flavor. It was good enough. But I'll probably go back to blue raspberry next. This sorta tastes like cotton candy for the first sip then just tastes sweet and it gets overbearing. I'm sure it works as well as any other flavor but only if you drink it. Not my first choice.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Good, Works a little better than average
customer_reviews.text: It tastes good. I wanted something that didnt have quite as many ingredients-maybe a little more healthy. It did give me a boost, more so when I first started using it and then I had to increase the dosage to equal the same amount of energy.
customer_reviews.author: B. Allen

customer_reviews.title: I love the taste and the energy
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste and the energy. I think it's a great product. However, two of my last three orders have had the top pop.The inner seal was stuck to the underside of the lid and product spilled out inside the box. The outer security band was still intact, though filled with powder itself. Probably better to just buy it locally for about the same price and not have to worry about the mess and the waste.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Taste is Off!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this off Amazon cause it’s just easier to buy everything from one place. The grape flavor is definitely not the same taste as the one I get at Vitamin Shoppe. Exact same packing too just not the exact same taste. I mean I’m gonna finish the container cause I don’t wanna waste my money, but definitely sticking to getting it just from Vitamin Shoppe.
customer_reviews.author: Darby Shultz

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is awful
customer_reviews.text: Great value ...Still a great amino and non jittery energy. The flavor,however, was horrible. I finished it but actually added fruit punch Hydra Charge from Kaged Muscle to choke it down. The value is great so I am going to try the grape flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Tarzanboy

customer_reviews.title: Great for 1 hour hit class
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste, and great price. $10 more at gnc and vitamin shop. I have noticed it doesn’t last a super long time. I think it’s perfect for a one hour hit class, not to go to the gym and lift weights for a longer period of time or for more intense intervals. Will even take small amounts before cardio.
customer_reviews.author: KATIE WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, mixes well
customer_reviews.text: Mixes easy, tastes like you’d expect a low sugar grape drink to taste. Reminds me of grape koolaide. I use one scoop in a 32 oz Nalgene with ice water. The flavor was too strong with two scoops, hence the 4 star. I love this stuff but wish the flavor wasn’t so strong so I could do 2 scoops at a time to get my caffeine in easier.
customer_reviews.author: R. Walter

customer_reviews.title: The smell of this makes me physically ill
customer_reviews.text: I often use this brand for pre-workout, but oh my god this is the first flavor I hate. It reminds me of drinking mouthwash. There is no "tea" flavor component, just mint, and artificial mint at that. I tried to give this a chance but it straight up makes me wretch. Any of their other flavors are great! Just avoid this one
customer_reviews.author: eights

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet (peach tea)
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was fine, the taste was a tad too sweet for me but overall I was satisfied. I'm not sure if it gave me any sort of energy but I'm not necessarily looking for that. My reason for using it is because I am vegetarian and I want to be sure I'm getting adequate amounts of amino acids. I did not reorder because I decided to try a different product, same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley D. Socling

customer_reviews.title: Useless product
customer_reviews.text: This was the most useless product that I ever bought through Amazon. This container came without the inner sealing, which is the standard practice of this manufacturer. This made me suspicious of the product. However, I went I ahead and tried the product. With the very first sip I realized this was not the original product and it made me sick. So, I ended up returning the product. I will never ever buy this product online hence forth.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmic Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Didnt really notice much my first batch. This one though doesn't taste like cotton candy..or at least like fresh cotton candy. More of a mixer with that and something savory. Not a fan. I have a higher tolerance to this kind of stuff so didnt notice anything
customer_reviews.author: FleshWhistle

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I can’t go a day without this! Tastes so good!
customer_reviews.author: SheraK12

customer_reviews.title: I just thought of going to try a better way to get a more "intensified" workout without the ...
customer_reviews.text: Iv'e tried many other prework out shakes... I just thought of going to try a better way to get a more "intensified" workout without the jitters I get with other preworkouts, and by golly I think I found it! Hats off to the people at ON! I WILL be buying more! (Peach tea tastes good, takes a bit to get used to, but it's now delicious! Ill try more flavors in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Elmer Fudd

customer_reviews.title: Did not taste like amino energy. Likely fake product.
customer_reviews.text: Did not taste like authentic amino energy. Mixed this up and had a taste and dumped it, I’ll be using what’s left of my old jar of amino energy until I can pick some up at GNC where I know it won’t be fake.
customer_reviews.author: Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and gives a nice boost
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite flavor - grape. Tastes like grape soda. I would drink this stuff all the time but that’s not what it’s made for. It gives me good energy for my workouts and I totally feel the difference.
customer_reviews.author: dru1313

customer_reviews.title: This absolutely doesn’t seem like the stuff I buy in the store
customer_reviews.text: This absolutely doesn’t seem like the stuff I buy in the store. Packaging looks slightly different even the quality still looks different... Definitely does not taste the same... This has a weird bitter aftertaste... Not happy with this purchase at all
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Padilla

customer_reviews.title: 🤢 Nasty
customer_reviews.text: Too sweet and tastes weird like your chugging liquid chewing gum. Not my jam. I was hoping it would be super mild flavor like a hint of mint water. I love the grape flavor, and the peach lemonade is okay/not bad. Also be advised all of their packaging is half- full . Personally I think they should make smaller canisters and actually fill them up.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is awful!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this flavor because some of the reviews said that it either tasted just like cotton candy or a blue raspberry flavor. I tried it and it tastes horrible. Has an odd after taste to it with a weird sour-like flavor to it. I've tried the watermelon flavor of this same brand and loved it but this one is no good. Save your money and get a different flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew and Hannah Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Effective and yummy
customer_reviews.text: I love the cotton candy flavor. Keep I. Mind that one serving is 2 scoops, I didn’t realize that at first and didn’t think I was getting enough of a pump, but once I started taking 2 scoops I felt crazy energized and only slight tingles. Definitely helps with recovery; when I use other brands without BCAAs in leg day I’m much more sore the next day, but with this one not as much soreness.
customer_reviews.author: tori

customer_reviews.title: Love amino energy!
customer_reviews.text: Been using amino energy for over 10 years. Not a coffee drinker so I do a scoop every morning to get me going. Cheaper than energy drinks 🤢
customer_reviews.author: Your Mamma

customer_reviews.title: Tastes delicious with a nice kick
customer_reviews.text: The grape flavor is quite tasty kind of like grape kool aid from my childhood. It gives a nice kick pre any workout I do without jitters or skin tingling. I don’t like the artificial sweeteners or colors but for the price I will use it for now.
customer_reviews.author: Niccie

customer_reviews.title: The Sweet Mint Tea flavor is disgusting.
customer_reviews.text: I promise that you will hate the Sweet Mint Tea flavor. It tastes like a very artificial mint julep mixed with mouthwash and has a never-ending chemical finish that will not leave my tongue. This is going in the trash because there isn't anyone in my life I would want to to poison with the rest of the bottle. The Watermelon flavor, however, is drinkable and tastes like a Jolly Rancher.
customer_reviews.author: Avett

customer_reviews.title: Good enough, there are better flavors out there
customer_reviews.text: I've been having these for a long time, the grape flavor is fine, however the watermelon one and the multifruit are way better in my opinion. The product itself works for getting that extra energy and is very flexible in terms of when to use it
customer_reviews.author: imanol a.

customer_reviews.title: By far a favorite of mine!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and the taste! Amazing!! It sticks to it testimony of being great for endurance and is not over stimulating. I like that I can put as much or as little as I want in my drinks. A definite 100% on my books. I will be stocking my cupboard with this.
customer_reviews.author: Von

customer_reviews.title: Powder everywhere
customer_reviews.text: This is poorly packaged. When you open it we were covered in powder. Its a total waste of the product, Taste is great and seems to help that after workout recovery.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Peculiar Taste
customer_reviews.text: I don’t want this to be a product review, as I have purchased Omino Energy grape flavor for several years. This is the only canister that I have ever received that has a bad taste. I have tried 3 different glasses of it, and it does not taste like grape & has a peculiar taste. Could this cannister be replaced? Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT flavor and mixes great!
customer_reviews.text: Long time user of this product. I quit drinking coffee years ago and substituted this as my morning pick me up. I also mix it up when I hit the gym. The flavor is a 10/10 for me. I will continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Flash2k3

customer_reviews.title: Best part of waking up
customer_reviews.text: Great pre-workout, post work-out or during work-out. Good flavor and great amount of amino's. Doesn't leave you jittery or your skin burning or itching like other pre-workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Cyprish

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Mint Tea is TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I love the amino energy, and usually get the grape flavor. However, I thought I'd try the sweet mint tea due to it's lower cost. Was not worth it. I just drank it, and am now sitting here 30 minutes later near the toilet about to throw up. It is by far the worst thing I've ever drank (including nasty cough syrup). Do not buy this flavor unless you are trying to prank someone!
customer_reviews.author: Paras

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this line from ON. I used to use the blueberry lemonade but wanted to change it up a bit, this flavor is delicious. The sweetner is more noticeable in the cotton candy than the others but not a deal breaker at all.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Kaay

customer_reviews.title: Half full
customer_reviews.text: Opened up the container and it wasn’t even half full. Ordered two small ones because the big ones were sold out and there’s no way the 2 small ones would equal a big one. Combining the two small ones together wouldn’t even fill a small container.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Knight

customer_reviews.title: I usually love Optimum Nutrition Amino Energy
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Optimum Nutrition Amino Energy. I have been using it for over four years. However- for some reason, this batch of amino energy is not good. The flavor is inconsistent with what I have had in "grape" flavors in the past few years. To reference- I have probably used over 10 "grape flavor" amino containers in the past four years with no issue. Just be warned that the consistency may be lacking in flavor before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Lane Scudder

customer_reviews.title: Not my first!
customer_reviews.text: I keep this product on hand at all times! Tastes great and gives me energy, plus I drink more water with it so I don't drink as much soda
customer_reviews.author: Diane Simons

product_meta.title: Optimum Nutrition Amino Energy - Pre Workout with Green Tea, BCAA, Amino Acids, Keto Friendly, Green Coffee Extract, Energy Powder - Concord Grape, 30 Servings
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Concord Grape| Size:9.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)Essential Amino Energy Concord Grape 0.6 lb PowderUse anytime for Essential Amino Acid Delivery, Nitric Oxide Production, Muscle Recovery Acceleration, Improved Energy and Focus. Free Form Amino Acids for Rapid Uptake. Essential Amino Acids including BCAAs. Supports Recovery Before, During & After Exercise. Train Longer & Harder with beta Alanine. Natural Energizers & Antioxidants. Supports Nitric Oxide Synthesis.
Suggested Use As a dietary supplement Mix two scoops of Essential Amino Energy in 10 12 oz of cold water. Recommended Use For an amino acid boost Consume one or more servings first thing in the morning and/or between meals. For pre workout energy take 1 3 servings 20 30 minutes before training. For post workout recovery Take 1 2 servings immediately after training. Dial Up Your Energy and Aminos Scoop 2, Energy Level Mild, Amino Level 5 grams, Scoop4, Energy Level Moderate, Amino Level 10 grams, Scoop 6, Energy Level Intense, Amino Level 15 grams. Tips Essential Amino Energy contains 50 mg of caffeine per scoop, so do not consume after 500pm if you have difficulty sleeping. Essential Amino Energy also contains beta alanine and may cause a temporary tingling sensation on your skin. This is normal. With continued use, the intensity of the sensation will decrease or disappear. Or as directed by your healthcare professional.
Supplement FactsServing Size: 2 Scoops Servings Per Container: 30Amount Per Serving percent Daily Value***Calories10Total Carbohydrates2 g1 percentAmino Blend5 energy Blend160 mg Proprietary Blends Amino Blend Micronized Taurine, Micronized L Glutamine, Micronized L Arginine, Micronized L Leucine, CarnoSyn Beta Alanine, Micronized Citrulline, Micronized L Isoleucine, Micronized L Valine, Micronized L Tyrosine, Micronized L Histidine, Micronized L Lysine, Micronized L Phenylalanine, Micronized L Theronine, Micronized L Methionine.Energy Blend Caffeine (from Green Tea), Green Tea Extract (Camellia sinensis)(
feature_bullets: AMINO BLEND – a perfectly blended mix of amino acids to aid in muscle recovery*
ENERGY BLEND – With 100MG of caffeine coming from green tea and/or green coffee extracts to supply you with a boost of energy to help you get through the day or a grueling workout*
MENTAL FOCUS – don’t allow the day to get the best of you, the unique formula in ESSENTIAL AMIN.O. ENERGY helps provide you with the mental focus you need*

ANY TIME FORMULA – this unique formula is perfect for any time of the day such as helping you get energized and focused in the morning, helping to stay focused and productive in the afternoon, or even supporting your energy levels and focus in the gym*
12 CALORIES PER SERVING; 1G OF CARBS; NO SUGAR; 10+ DELIGHTFUL FLAVORS TO CHOOSE FROM

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
